thread.title: Google changes logo 'to show when magic is working' - This is The West Country
thread.title_full: Google changes logo 'to show when magic is working' - This is The West Country - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: This is The West Country
title: Google changes logo 'to show when magic is working' - This is The West Country
text:
The search engine company said it tweaked its multi-coloured logo to make it easier for users to use it on apps and mobile devices. In a blogpost explaining the redesign, the company said: "Google has changed a lot over the past 17 years - from the range of our products to the evolution of their look and feel.
 This is The West Country.
